name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro timer Extension with TODO list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension with a pomodoro with TODO list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This pomodoro-timer addon facilitates task focus and productivity. With so many digital distractions around us these days, it is difficult for us to concentrate on our work.
This plugin facilitates your ability to concentrate for a set amount of time.
Concentrating on your work gives you a sense of fulfillment and enhances your attention span.

Increase the time interval if you have mastered the ability to focus on shorter durations.
